p: Whole plant of P. perfoliatum can be used as medicine, which has high medicinal value, not only to be eaten but also has a certain health care effect. In the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous region, people use P. perfoliatum together with other materials to make a tea drink for the treatment of hemorrhoids; its formula has now been patented ( Meng, 2017). In addition, P. perfoliatum is also used as the raw material of a health care capsule, which is effective in treating cough and indigestion, strengthening the body, improving immunity, and moisturizing skin tone ( Ni, 2018).
